txt.en:
'Your pardon, but I could really use a bit of assistance...

'I've got a good friend, a Hunter by the name of Juhani, who was due back a good little while ago. Went out looking for furs -- kalpa-kita, you know, they have right soft and pretty furs. Sell well, in the south, keep us in pipeweed and ale, as well as non-essential goods and supplies.

'It has now been too long, and I am concerned.  Please, go look for him! Kalpa-kita infest an island in the middle of the river, south and a bit east of here.'
'Have you not found any trace yet? Might try heading south and looking on the island called Kissa-sari....'
Tero is worried; his colleague and friend Juhani has gone missing.
Kissa-sari is an island in the river to the south and slightly east of Zigilgund.\n\nTero suggests you search an island known as Kissa-sari for his friend Juhani.
